gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Cavaliers 110, Pistons 100
gameRecap.excerpt: The Cavaliers defeated the Pistons, 110-100. Darius Garland led the way for the Cavaliers with 29 points and a season-high eight 3PM, while Evan Mobley added 22 points, 17 rebounds and seven assists in the victory. Cade Cunningham notched 21 points and 10 assists for the Pistons in the losing effort. The Cavaliers improve to 39-20 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 9-50.
